short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Given a movie title, this Chrome extension spits out a list of other pictures the movie's cast and crew have collaborated on.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Loved the Irishman (2019)? Find out if De Niro, Pesci and Scorsese have other collaborations!
